content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, thank you for considering my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I must clarify that I am a landlord and my goal is to maximize my gains. Would you be willing to negotiate to reach a mutually beneficial agreement? If so, please let me know your initial offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to 1500 Euros per month for 12 months. Thank you for considering my offer.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your offer, Aziz. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I must say that I am not willing to accept your proposal of 1500 Euros per month for 12 months. I believe that my apartment is worth much more than that, and I am looking for a higher rental price. Would you be willing to increase your offer? If so, please let me know your new proposal.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to 2000 Euros per month for 12 months. Thank you for considering my offer.

I also want to add that I am a student and I am very responsible, so I will take good care of the apartment. Additionally, I will sign a lease agreement to ensure that I am legally bound to the terms of our agreement.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Thank you again for considering my offer.

Sincerely,

Mister Heine
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your counteroffer, Aziz. I appreciate your willingness to increase the rental price. However, I must say that I am still not willing to accept your proposal of 2000 Euros per month for 12 months. I believe that my apartment is worth much more than that, and I am looking for a higher rental price.

I understand that you are a student and you are very responsible, and I appreciate your willingness to sign a lease agreement. However, I must say that I have other potential tenants who are also very responsible and willing to sign a lease agreement. Therefore, I am looking for the highest possible rental price.

If you are willing to increase your offer further, please let me know. Otherwise, I must say that I am unable to accept your current proposal.

Thank you for your understanding, and I wish you the best of luck in your future endeavors.

Sincerely,

Mister Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
